item.title: Project I: configuring a 3-node kafka cluster
item.description: Apache Kafka is a distributed and easily scalable messaging system with high bandwidth that can process huge amount of data in real time. item.title: Project II: Bank customers churn predictions
item.description: The Bank can take enough insights from the Exploratory Data Analysis performed to understand which kind of Customers are more likely to leave. XGBoost Classifier model can be safely used to safely predict whether a customer will leave or not. By looking at the feature importance, we can mitigate further churn by applying the necessary remedial actions Link to GitHub
